And <S%H378>Ish-bosheth<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> her from her <S%H376>husband<s%>, even from <S%H6409>Phaltiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3889%H3919>Laish<s%>.

And her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with her along <S%H1980%H1058>weeping<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> her to <S%H980>Bahurim<s%>. Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%>. And he <S%H7725>returned<s%>.

¶ And <S%H74>Abner<s%> had <S%H1961%H1697>communication<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye <S%H1245>sought<s%> for <S%H1732>David<s%> in <S%H8543>times<s%> <S%H8032>past<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over you:
